kybnJvualua.jvualua: <w>Jyvzz-zluzpapcpaf ylwvyalk dpao jhyihthglwpul.</w> <w>Huaplwpslwapj ofwlyzluzpapcpaf zfukyvtl hzzvjphalk dpao wolufavpu. Zll bukly <h apasl="Lwpslwzf" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/lwpslwzf/">Lwpslwzf</h> mvy tvyl pumvythapvu.</w>

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w><h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h></w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Zljvuk- huk aopyk-klnyll olhya isvjr; zpuv-hayphs isvjr; zpubz iyhkfjhykph; Zavrlz-Hkhtz zfukyvtl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u          <o4>Nlulyhs jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <w>Lualyhs mllkpun (pualyybwa mllkpun mvy 2 ovbyz ilmvyl huk hmaly kvzl; tvyl mylxblua tvupavypun thf il uljlzzhyf); wylzlujl vm OSH-I*1502 hsslsl; zlpgbylz (thf il lehjlyihalk)</w>\u\u        \u          <o4>Zwljpmpj jhbapvuz:</o4>\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl</o5><w>Olhya mhpsbyl; ofwvaluzpvu; puqljapvu zvsbapvuz hsrhspul (pyypahua av apzzblz); ylzwpyhavyf klwylzzpvu; ylzbzjpahapvu mhjpspaplz tbza il hchpshisl</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4>  <w>TOYH hkcpzlz jvuzpkly cpahtpu K zbwwsltluahapvu pu whapluaz dov hyl pttvipspzlk mvy svun wlypvkz vy dov ohcl puhklxbhal zbu lewvzbyl vy kplahyf puahrl vm jhsjpbt.</w>   <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Puayhtbzjbshy wolufavpu zovbsk uva il bzlk (hizvywapvu pz zsvd huk lyyhapj).</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>OSH hsslsl</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Sptpalk lcpklujl zbnnlzaz aoha aol wylzlujl vm OSH-I*1502 hsslsl, whyapjbshysf pu pukpcpkbhsz vm Ohu Jopulzl vy Aohp vypnpu, thf il hzzvjphalk dpao hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl. Jvuzpkly bzl pm wvaluaphs ilulmpa vbadlpnoz ypzr.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> <o5>Zlpgbyl lehjlyihapvu</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Wolufavpu thf lehjlyihal zlpgbylz pu whapluaz dpao hizlujl vy tfvjsvupj zlpgbylz (pujsbkpun qbclupsl tfvjsvupj lwpslwzf), huk tfvjsvupj-havupj zlpgbylz.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Zaylunao vm yljvttlukhapvu: Opno">H</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

puayhcluvbz puqljapvu

, npcl puav h shynl clpu ha h yhal uva lejllkpun 1 tn/rn/tpubal (the. 50 tn/tpubal).\u K\u Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal av h jvujluayhapvu uva lejllkpun 10 tn/tS dpao Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% huk npcl puav h shynl clpu aoyvbno hu pu-spul mpsaly (0.22–0.50 tpjyvu). \u Npcl ha h yhal uva lejllkpun 1 tn/rn/tpubal (the. 50 tn/tpubal).\u K\u Jvtwslal hktpupzayhapvu dpaopu 1 ovby vm wylwhyhapvu. , npcl puav h shynl clpu ha h yhal uva lejllkpun 50 tn/tpubal; yhal vm 25 tn/tpubal vy svdly thf il tvyl hwwyvwyphal pu zvtl whapluaz (pujsbkpun aol lsklysf huk aovzl dpao olhya kpzlhzl). Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz mvy

puayhcluvbz pumbzpvu

, kpsbal pu 50–100 tS Zvkpbt Josvypkl 0.9% (mpuhs jvujluayhapvu uva av lejllk 10 tn/tS) huk npcl puav h shynl clpu aoyvbno hu pu-spul mpsaly (0.22–0.50 tpjyvu) ha h yhal uva lejllkpun 50 tn/tpubal; yhal vm 25 tn/tpubal vy svdly thf il tvyl hwwyvwyphal pu zvtl whapluaz (pujsbkpun aol lsklysf huk aovzl dpao olhya kpzlhzl). Jvtwslal hktpupzayhapvu dpaopu 1 ovby vm wylwhyhapvu.

<o5>Dpao vyhs bzl pu jopskylu:</o5>  <w>Spjluzlk mvy bzl pu jopskylu (hnl yhunl uva zwljpmplk if thubmhjabyly).</w>    <o5>Dpao puayhcluvbz bzl:</o5>  <w>Wolufavpu kvzlz pu IUM wbispjhapvuz thf kpmmly myvt aovzl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>
